name: HappinessPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Doctor Puff”
”Alexa, start Doctor Puff”
”Alexa, ask Doctor Puff”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor puff
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you ever wonder what it takes to lead a peaceful, happy life? Are you curious about the specific steps involved in a self-actualized, limitless life? Are you struggling with anxiety or depression? Or are you just plain tired and want some help? We explore all these concerns and more every week on the Happiness Podcast, which has been downloaded over 6 million times since its inception. Happiness does not happen by chance, but because we take specific actions in our lives to create it. Dr. Robert Puff, Ph.D., author of 13 books, TV show host, Psychology Today blogger, and corporate trainer, has been studying the actions it takes to reach the highest levels of human achievement for decades, and he wants to share what he knows with you. Come and explore, along with millions of others from the Happiness Podcast, Dr. Puff books, Psychology Today blog, and corporate workshop attendees, the specific steps to take so that you can soar in your life. To learn more, go to: http://www.HappinessPodcast.org/

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Doctor Puff to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Doctor Puff to start from first episode”
